summary: A young woman discovers a Christmas-themed dreamworld inside a magical snowglobe.
cast: Christina Milian|Erin Karpluk|Hilda Doherty|Jason Schombing|James Kot|Andrew Krivanek|Josh Cooke|Ennis Esmer|Lorraine Bracco|Luciana Carro|Ron Canada|Matt Keeslar|Christine Willes|Kailin See|Kevin Rothery|Don Bland|Iain Dunbar|Josh Garcia|Dan McDougall
title: Snowglobe
